Package com.harmonia.backend.controller

Class DirectMessageController

java.lang.Object
com.harmonia.backend.controller.DirectMessageController
@RestController @RequestMapping("dmessage") public class DirectMessageController extends Object
This class is a REST controller for DirectMessage API endpoints. It handles GET requests for listing direct messages and filtering them by recipient and author ID.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harmonia team

  • Constructor Details

    • DirectMessageController

      public DirectMessageController(DirectMessageService dmService)
      Constructs a DirectMessageController instance with a DirectMessageService instance.
      Parameters:
      dmService - the DirectMessageService instance used to handle direct message operations

  • Method Details

    • listMessages

      @GetMapping @CrossOrigin public Iterable<DmessageResponse> listMessages(@RequestParam(name="dmessageId",required=false) String dmId)
      Handles GET requests to list all direct messages or filter them by direct message ID.
      Parameters:
      dmId - the ID of the direct message to filter by (optional)
      Returns:
      an iterable collection of DmessageResponse objects representing the direct messages that match the filter

    • listDMsByRecipientId

      @GetMapping("recipientId/{recipientId}") @CrossOrigin public Iterable<DmessageResponse> listDMsByRecipientId(@PathVariable("recipientId") Long recipientId)
      Handles GET requests to list all direct messages that have the given recipient ID.
      Parameters:
      recipientId - the ID of the recipient to filter by
      Returns:
      an iterable collection of DmessageResponse objects representing the direct messages that match the filter

    • listDMsByAuthorId

      @GetMapping("authorId/{authorId}") @CrossOrigin public Iterable<DmessageResponse> listDMsByAuthorId(@PathVariable("authorId") Long authorId)
      Handles GET requests to list all direct messages that have the given author ID.
      Parameters:
      authorId - the ID of the author to filter by
      Returns:
      an iterable collection of DmessageResponse objects representing the direct messages that match the filter

    • sendDMessage

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DirectMessage> sendDMessage(@RequestBody DMessageRequest directMessageRequest)
      Handles POST requests to send a direct message.
      Parameters:
      directMessageRequest - a DMessageRequest object representing the direct message to send
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the DirectMessage object that was sent, or a BAD_REQUEST status if an error occurred

    • deleteDMessage

      @DeleteMapping @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteDMessage(@RequestBody DirectMessage directMessage)
      Handles DELETE requests to delete a direct message.
      Parameters:
      directMessage - a DirectMessage object representing the direct message to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a message indicating that the direct message was deleted, or a BAD_REQUEST status if an error occurred

    • editMessage

      @PutMapping("messageId/{messageId}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> editMessage(@PathVariable Long messageId, @RequestBody DirectMessage directMessage)
      Edit a direct message.
      Parameters:
      messageId - the ID of the direct message to edit
      directMessage - the DirectMessage object with the updated information
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a message indicating success and a HTTP status code
